hotels.hotel_description: A luxurious 5-star hotel offering magnificent views of the Dnipro River and Podil. Features include a grand ballroom, spa, and fine dining. Ideal for high-end leisure and business travelers.

hotels.hotel_name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Kyiv Podil City Centre
hotels.hotel_description: A contemporary hotel known for its convenient location near the river port and Kontraktova Ploshcha. Offers modern rooms, meeting facilities, and high service standards.

A boutique design hotel with a focus on art and culture, located in a renovated 19th-century building. Features a rooftop bar, art gallery, and a cozy atmosphere. Popular among young, creative travelers.
A charming, smaller hotel offering personalized service right near the central historical square of Podil. A great choice for travelers who prefer a local, authentic experience.
A modern mid-range hotel providing all essential comforts and good connectivity to the city center and main Podil attractions. Focuses on practicality and value for money.
A premium 5-star hotel located right on Svobody Avenue. Offers luxurious rooms, a state-of-the-art spa center, and a casino. Perfect for luxury and entertainment seekers.
Located opposite the Opera House, this hotel combines historical architecture with modern comfort. Known for its elegant interiors and central location, ideal for exploring the city on foot.

A unique 5-star hotel located in a magnificent 19th-century fortress (citadel) with panoramic views of the city. Offers a peaceful, secluded setting close to the center, with a focus on high-end service.
A stylish boutique hotel situated in the heart of the Old Town. Features individually designed rooms, a wine cellar, and a charming, intimate atmosphere. Perfect for romantic and cultural trips.
An exclusive 5-star property combining classic elegance and personalized service. Features a luxury restaurant and spa facilities. Located centrally but slightly away from the main tourist bustle.
A themed, luxury resort designed like an ocean liner. Offers extensive water parks, numerous dining options, and a vast private beach area. Perfect for families and couples.
A popular 5-star resort known for its high level of service and large pools. Focuses on an Ultra All-Inclusive experience with diverse entertainment programs.
hotels.hotel_address: Kemerağzı Mahallesi, Yaşar Sobutay Cd. No:33, Antalya

hotels.hotel_description: An opulent and grand hotel featuring a striking design, multiple à la carte restaurants, and excellent children's facilities. A top choice for a luxurious family beach holiday.
A resort with an emphasis on nature and relaxation, surrounded by lush gardens. Offers a quieter atmosphere combined with the full All-Inclusive package.
hotels.hotel_address: Kundu Köyü, Kervansaray Mevkii, Lara, Antalya

hotels.hotel_name: Limak Lara De Luxe Hotel & Resort
hotels.hotel_description: Known for its modern architecture and varied culinary experiences. Offers comprehensive facilities for both active holidays and relaxation, right on the beachfront.
hotels.hotel_address: Kemerağzı Mahallesi, Yaşar Sobutay Cd. No:34, Antalya

hotels.hotel_name: Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at Sultanahmet
hotels.hotel_description: Housed in a century-old neo-classical prison, this ultra-luxury hotel offers an exclusive, serene experience within the Old City walls. Known for its lush courtyard and exceptional service.

hotels.hotel_name: Hagia Sofia Mansions Istanbul, Curio Collection by Hilton
hotels.hotel_description: A collection of beautifully restored Ottoman mansions offering an intimate stay. Features stunning views and direct proximity to Hagia Sophia. Combines history with modern luxury amenities.
hotels.hotel_address: Ayasofya Meydanı, Yerebatan Cd. No:3, 34122 Fatih/İstanbul

hotels.hotel_description: A stylish hotel with modern rooms and a prime location near all major sights. Features a beautiful garden, an outdoor pool, and traditional Turkish hospitality.
hotels.hotel_address: Alemdar Mah. Ticarethane Sok. No:13, Sultanahmet, İstanbul

hotels.hotel_name: DoubleTree by Hilton Istanbul - Old Town
hotels.hotel_description: A reliable, comfortable hotel providing the well-known Hilton standard of service. Located slightly further from the main square, offering easy access to the tram line and Grand Bazaar.
A famous boutique hotel, primarily known for its rooftop restaurant which offers unparalleled, iconic views of both Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque. Great value for location.
A luxurious beachfront resort known for its extensive private beach, huge lagoon pool, and 9-hole golf course. Focuses on high-end service and wellness.

hotels.hotel_name: Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & Spa
hotels.hotel_description: A popular 4-star hotel built on a magnificent lagoon. Offers direct access to the sea from all areas and a lively atmosphere, ideal for active vacationers.
A long-established resort with a beautiful, vast beach and lush grounds. Known for its laid-back atmosphere and excellent value, located centrally in the Sakalla area.
Located on a peninsula in the heart of Hurghada, offering beautiful sea views and access to a private beach and snorkeling areas. Features a tranquil atmosphere and comfortable facilities.
A large, vibrant resort right in the center of Sakalla. Popular for its aqua park, multiple pools, and proximity to shopping and nightlife. A great choice for families and those seeking action.
A premium resort known for its stunning private beach, exceptional diving/snorkeling access, and expansive spa facilities. Offers high-quality dining and service.
An ultra-luxury resort with an outstanding Ultra All-Inclusive concept. Features numerous pools, world-class entertainment, and a massive spa complex dedicated to wellness and relaxation.
Offers a great location with direct access to a beautiful reef. Known for its calm environment, professional service, and good balance between quality and affordability in the Montaza area.
A highly-rated resort focusing on a peaceful atmosphere and excellent facilities, including a well-regarded spa. Its location is close to the airport but offers a secluded beachfront.

hotels.hotel_name: Park Regency Sharm El Sheikh Resort
hotels.hotel_description: (Formerly Hyatt Regency) A grand resort set in beautiful landscaped gardens with cascading pools. Features a comprehensive spa, fitness center, and private beach in a tranquil setting.
A luxurious hotel offering spectacular views of the Acropolis from its rooftop garden and pool. Combines traditional Athenian architecture with modern amenities.
(Located near Plaka, but easily accessible) A modern luxury hotel known for its stunning rooftop pool and bar overlooking the city, offering a high-end, contemporary stay.
A highly-rated, centrally located hotel that beautifully merges neoclassical design with modern luxury. Features a unique glass-covered atrium and an Acropolis-view rooftop pool.
Located right across from the National Gardens, offering spacious rooms and views of the Acropolis. Known for its environmentally conscious practices and central position near Plaka.
A distinct design hotel by the Campana Brothers, located near Plaka. Offers edgy, custom-made furniture and a vibrant, artistic atmosphere, appealing to modern travelers.
Thessaloniki's iconic luxury hotel, located directly on the waterfront. Offers spacious rooms, fine dining, and stunning views of the Thermaikos Gulf. A symbol of the city.
A contemporary design hotel located near the port, offering easy access to the city center. Features a rooftop pool with panoramic views and a world-class spa.
Situated in the heart of Aristotelous Square, this hotel is known for its Venetian-style architecture and prime location. Offers a spectacular rooftop restaurant overlooking the sea.
A boutique hotel right on the seafront promenade. Known for its stylish, modern design, impeccable service, and a highly-rated Mediterranean restaurant.
A globally recognized brand offering reliable comfort and excellent business facilities. Located near the main railway station and a short walk from the coast and city center.
A long-established, luxury hotel located near Bačvice beach, a short walk from the Old Town. Known for its traditional elegance, exceptional service, and spa facilities.
A modern, high-quality hotel located just a minute's walk from the Diocletian's Palace. Features a superb rooftop terrace with views of the Old Town and the sea.
A unique boutique hotel built into the ancient walls of Diocletian’s Palace. Offers an exclusive, romantic experience and combines Roman architecture with contemporary design.
A luxurious, contemporary hotel known for its large size, indoor pool, spa, and conference facilities. Located slightly outside the absolute center, offering easy parking and connectivity.
A charming boutique hotel located inside the Diocletian's Palace walls. Features carefully restored historical elements and personalized service, offering an immersive historical experience.
An iconic, luxury seaside hotel offering breathtaking, direct views of the Old Town. Features modern design, a private beach, and world-class dining.
A historic hotel located just outside Pile Gate, providing quick access to the Old Town. Combines 19th-century charm with modern amenities, including a full-service spa.
Perched on a cliff edge overlooking Miramare Bay, offering dramatic sea views and a private beach. Known for its sophisticated atmosphere and excellent gastronomic experience.
A stunning modern hotel located on the peninsula of Lapad, famous for its magnificent sea views, infinity pools, and dive center. A perfect blend of beach and city access.
A charming, small, and intimate boutique hotel located *inside* the city walls. Offers luxurious apartments and a highly personalized stay, ideal for travelers seeking immersion in the Old Town.
The first 5-star hotel on the Montenegrin coast, located near Bečići beach. Offers a massive spa, multiple pools, and high-end conference facilities. Luxury beach choice.
A modern, centrally located hotel right on the promenade, close to the beach and Old Town. Known for its excellent service and convenient city access.
Strategically located next to Budva's Old Town, offering stunning views and direct access to the Mogren beach. Features a complex of modern rooms and exclusive villas.
A distinctive high-rise complex offering spacious apartments and rooms with modern design. Located centrally, features a rooftop pool with panoramic views of the sea and mountains.
A new, highly-rated hotel known for its exceptional modern design, comfort, and prime location close to the Slovenska Plaza beach. Offers a boutique atmosphere with excellent amenities.
A premium international hotel located in the heart of the city. Features a massive spa (Doclea Spa), indoor pool, and excellent conference facilities.
A modern, stylish hotel known for its comfort and service. Located in a quieter part of the center, offers spacious rooms and a great fitness center.
A luxurious boutique hotel offering exclusive, elegant accommodation and personalized service. Features an indoor pool and a highly-rated restaurant.
A popular boutique hotel located right in the main pedestrian area. Known for its unique, artistic design and one of the best cafes/restaurants in the city.
A modern, business-oriented hotel located in the new business district (The Capital Plaza). Offers contemporary design, excellent co-working spaces, and a lively bar scene.

hotels.hotel_name: Hotel Bristol, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Warsaw
hotels.hotel_description: An iconic, historic luxury hotel located on the Royal Route, adjacent to the Old Town. Features art nouveau interiors, a renowned bar, and a world-class spa.
A stunning, newly restored landmark hotel known for its incredible art collection and sophisticated, modern design. Offers the highest level of luxury near the Old Town.
A luxurious boutique hotel housed in a former 18th-century palace in the New Town, moments from the Old Town. Features an exclusive spa, indoor pool, and a tranquil courtyard.
Located in the former Bishops' Palace, right in the heart of the Old Town. Combines historical grandeur with elegant modern rooms. Offers a unique, period-style stay.
A contemporary design hotel located near the city center and easily accessible from the Old Town. Known for its modern art, excellent dining, and lively atmosphere.
A stunning 5-star hotel near the Main Square, walking distance from Kazimierz. Features a unique blend of old and new design, a spa, and a rooftop terrace with excellent views.
Located near Wawel Castle and the Vistula River, offering a beautiful view and easy access to both the Old Town and Kazimierz. Known for its atrium and quality service.
A charming boutique hotel located right in the heart of Kazimierz. Housed in a historic tenement house, offering rooms with character and an intimate atmosphere.
Offers stylish and spacious apartments, providing a comfortable base for exploring the area. Located between the Old Town and Kazimierz, offering great flexibility for travelers.
A reliable, modern hotel offering consistent quality and comfort. Located just outside the Jewish Quarter, providing a quiet base with easy access to all cultural sites.
Offers spacious, fully equipped serviced apartments, ideal for longer stays or families. Features an indoor pool and sauna. Located near the Natural History Museum.
An exclusive, privately-run luxury hotel near Potsdamer Platz. Known for its sophisticated design, spacious suites, and the 2-Michelin-star restaurant, Facil.
A classical luxury hotel located right on Gendarmenmarkt. Offers opulent furnishings, world-class service, and is perfectly situated for cultural immersion.
A modern, stylish hotel located on the Spree River. Features contemporary rooms, a small gym, and easy access to the central business and tourist areas.
A stunning Art Deco-inspired hotel on Potsdamer Platz. Known for its luxury amenities, elegant service, and the exquisite Tea Lounge.

hotels.hotel_name: Andaz Munich Schwabinger Tor - a Concept by Hyatt
hotels.hotel_description: A sophisticated, modern design hotel in the heart of Schwabing. Features a rooftop bar with panoramic views, a luxury spa, and a vibrant neighborhood location.
A comfortable and modern hotel located in the quiet part of Schwabing. Offers spacious rooms, conference facilities, and excellent connectivity to the city center.
A well-known hotel brand offering reliable, high-quality accommodation. Features a large garden terrace and is conveniently located near the Englischer Garten (Англійський сад).
A prominent luxury hotel located directly adjacent to the Englischer Garten. Known for its enormous park-side rooms, stunning views, and large convention capacity.
A business-friendly hotel offering spacious, contemporary rooms. Located slightly north of Schwabing-West, known for its excellent value and reliable service.

hotels.hotel_name: Four Seasons Hotel George V, Paris
hotels.hotel_description: An iconic Parisian Palace hotel located near the Champs-Élysées. Known for its world-renowned culinary excellence (3 Michelin stars) and spectacular flower arrangements.
A true "Palace" distinction hotel on the Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré. Features a rooftop swimming pool with Eiffel Tower views and a vast private garden courtyard.
Famous for its iconic view of the Eiffel Tower from many rooms and its high fashion district location. A symbol of Parisian high society and luxury.
An elegant, contemporary Palace hotel located on Rue Saint-Honoré. Known for its serene inner garden, excellent spa, and close proximity to luxury boutiques.
Housed in a beautifully restored historic building, offering a blend of classic Parisian grandeur and modern luxury. Features a stunning rooftop restaurant with 360-degree views.
A legendary, historically listed hotel known for its distinctive pink dome and incredible art collection spanning five centuries. Offers an unparalleled luxury experience on the Promenade.

hotels.hotel_name: Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée
hotels.hotel_description: A spectacular 1930s-style hotel with direct Promenade access. Features a unique indoor/outdoor swimming pool overlooking the sea and a sophisticated casino.
A modern, beachfront hotel known for its stunning rooftop pool and bar, offering panoramic views of the sea and the city. Located close to Place Masséna and the Old Town.
(Located near the Promenade end) A contemporary hotel offering easy access to the beach and airport. Features a rooftop pool and is popular among business travelers and transit stays.
Located just off the Promenade, close to the Old Town. Known for its colourful façade, rooftop pool, and convenient location for exploring the city's main attractions.
An iconic luxury skyscraper overlooking the beach and city. Features a stunning outdoor pool, a renowned spa, and several fine dining restaurants, including a Michelin-starred option.
A distinct, sail-shaped luxury hotel located right at the edge of the beach. Known for its modern design, rooftop bar (Eclipse), and vibrant, cosmopolitan atmosphere.
hotels.hotel_address: Plaça de la Rosa dels Vents, 1, 08039 Barcelona

hotels.hotel_name: Hampton by Hilton Barcelona Fira Gran Vía
hotels.hotel_description: (Located near the sea, offering good value) A modern, comfortable hotel known for its reliable Hilton service and complimentary breakfast. Offers good access to the city and coastal areas.
hotels.hotel_address: Av. de la Granvia de l'Hospitalet, 40, 08902 L'Hospitalet de Llobregat

hotels.hotel_description: A stylish, modern hotel located near the Port Vell (Old Harbour), offering a prime location between the Gothic Quarter and Barceloneta. Features a small rooftop plunge pool.
Located slightly north of Barceloneta, near Mar Bella Beach. A modern hotel focused on the adults-only concept, offering a peaceful stay with direct beach access.

hotels.hotel_name: Ritz Madrid, a Mandarin Oriental Hotel
hotels.hotel_description: An iconic, historic luxury hotel, recently renovated, located in the "Golden Triangle of Art" near the Prado Museum. Known for its legendary service and beautiful gardens.
A stunning "Palacio de la Equitativa" landmark conversion, offering unparalleled luxury, a multi-story spa, and a vibrant food and beverage hub (Galería Canalejas).
A striking modern design hotel on Plaza de España. Features an impressive rooftop terrace with a glass-bottom pool and panoramic views of the city.
Located in the iconic Edificio España skyscraper, famous for its 360-degree rooftop bar and spectacular city views. Offers modern, comfortable rooms and a prime central location.
A chic, upscale boutique hotel located in the trendy Salesas district of the center. Known for its sophisticated, stylish interiors and excellent service.
